templates.title: Nextcloud (Pi Optimized)
templates.name: nextcloud_pi
templates.note: Self-hosted cloud server with MariaDB backend. Volumes mapped to /opt/nextcloud.
templates.description: Deploys Nextcloud optimized for Raspberry Pi 4. Includes PUID/PGID, timezone, and MariaDB integration.

templates.title: Uptime Kuma
templates.name: uptime_kuma
templates.note: Self-hosted monitoring dashboard. Volume mapped to /opt/uptime-kuma.
templates.description: Deploys Uptime Kuma on port 3001 to monitor your sites and services.

templates.title: File Browser
templates.name: filebrowser
templates.note: Lightweight file manager with web interface. Volumes mapped to /opt.
templates.description: Runs File Browser on port 8081 to manage local files on your Pi.

templates.title: meTube (yt-dlp frontend)
templates.name: metube
templates.note: YouTube downloader with web UI on port 8085. Includes yt-dlp + ffmpeg.
templates.description: Deploys meTube to download videos/audio from YouTube and other platforms.

templates.title: Weather Map (Meteo)
templates.name: weather_map
templates.note: Runs a lightweight OpenWeatherMap dashboard for Raspberry Pi.
templates.description: Displays weather data in a clean, lightweight dashboard UI. Ideal for kiosks or info screens.
